_comment1: LogLevel only affects production; error=0, warn=1, info=2, http=3, debug=4
_comment2: tracker time gap for to processId; requiremend =61000
_comment3: logWatcherpath SimDefault: './../../logs/' from the Util folder to location

testmode._comment1: queueBehaviors config=true means behaviors add testJob to queue and obliterateJobs will be enabled
testmode._comment2: byPassQueue=true allow testJobs only to go into queue; use this automation
